item.title: Bruno Mars - The Lazy Song - Key of G
item.description:
The Lazy Song by Bruno Mars. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber gizmothing1, I digitally lowered the recording so you can play it without a capo and added the ukulele chord diagrams. The original lyric video may be found here - https://youtu.be/k1_26Iayp1s . For educational use. Chords Used: G C D B7 Am Bm Em
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Bruno Mars - Count on Me - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Bruno Mars.
Time for a good question: Why make this play along when others have done so? Simple answer...I had to make a practice track for my choirs and the end result was a file so close to the original that it took less than 10 minutes to edit and render the video to YouTube. In addition, this video utilizes all of the techniques that I have been learning over the last year of making videos.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Bruno Mars - Just the Way You Are - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Three chords, although one is Bb. With the repetition and slow changes, this is a great song to work on that Bb. One educational warning...the lyrics at one point talk about a "sexy" smile...hope your students can handle that!
As performed by Bruno Mars.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
